title: Smart Data Models - SvStatus
description: Adapted from CIM data models. State variable for status.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SvStatus

ConductingEquipment.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The conducting equipment associated with the status state variable. Default: None

inService.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The in service status as a result of topology processing. Default: False
